adjectives.description: ostrichlike (comparative more ostrichlike, superlative most ostrichlike)

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of an ostrich; struthian
Ignoring an imminent threat or unpleasant reality; head-in-the-sand
examples: Should our response to these paradoxes of the modern world be to maintain our comfort level with an ostrichlike denial of the evidence, or to hold an alarmist and paranoid discourse?
